message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll appreciate its worth. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1000000.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $900000?

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $900000. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1050000. This is my best and final offer on this product, and I'm confident you'll see the value in it.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still looking to stay within my budget. Could we possibly agree on a price of $950000? I believe this would be a fair compromise for both of us.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable meeting you at $950000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1025000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

Thank you for considering my budget, Alice. I've reviewed my options carefully, and I'm willing to offer $975000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable, as I'm keen on acquiring it without exceeding my financial limits.

I appreciate your diligence, Bob, but I'm still not willing to meet you at $975000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $1000000, which is my absolute minimum. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'll have to consider other options.

I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer $980000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to move forward with the transaction.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to the point of no return. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $990000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.
